CustomField.formula:
CASE(TEXT( ordexp_CVC__c ), "Issued","CustActionRequired",
"NYCE","Processed", "TADCredit","Processed", "Return Home","Processed", "Proceed","Processed", "POM","Processed", "Open Credit","Processed", "Open Credit(Revised)","Processed", "DateChange","Processed", "Declined","Processed", "Cancel & Credit","Processed", "Cancelled","Processed", "Forced Credit","Processed", "1939PaymentReceivedReissue","Processed", "DateChange","Processed", "TADDefer","Processed", "3237ExclCredit","Processed", "CancelManualCredit","Processed", "TADCredit","Processed",
"3111Opt1","Goodwill", "3111Opt2","Goodwill", "Goodwill","Goodwill", "Unaffected","BAU",
"Voucher","TADActionRequired", "TADActionRequired","TADActionRequired",
"TADRefund","BERefund", "BERefund","BERefund",
"RefundProcessed","RefundProcessed",
"Chargeback","Chargeback",
IF( AND(ISBLANK(TEXT(ordexp_CVC__c )),TEXT( ordexp_TAD_Order__r.ordexp_master_status__c ) <> "Expired",TEXT(ordexp_TAD_Order__r.ordexp_master_status__c) <> "Cancelled") ,
"BAU", "-")
)
CustomField.label: COVID19
